Body:
Description: Licensed for AD Activity in Netwrix Enterprise Auditor, but it was never configured.
Implementation was migrated over to new environment from an old deployment
We added the 6.Activity job group to the AD job group, during a meeting for ticket 00434204, but this has not yet been configured.

Next Steps Updated: Meet with client
-confirm if NTP is auditing AD activity
-Deploy NAM agents on DCs
-Configure NTP for AD activity and forwarding to NAM agents

What We've Learned Updated: split from ticket 00434204

NAM does not have any DCs added - only FS
Also licensed for NTP AD
-need to check if they are actively auding AD with NTP
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Joshua Sexton, Ryan Tyson

looking at the logs it shows it add the file output then remove the file output

I think the agent constant refresh while installing the agent might be part of the problem

 

out of time
